name: CUBE GAME (ArthurXH9)
description:
CUBE GAME is a game based on Awesome Tuts Hyper Casual game tutorial.

With some additional visual effects and sound effects.

You play with a cube and you should stay on the platforms without falling or getting hit by a spike. You should be careful from the breakable platforms.

You get score for how many stars you collected.

How to play:

Tap the left side of the screen to go left and the right side of the screen to go right.
